item.title: Steve Jobs and the Art of Timeless Innovation: Beyond Backdated Numbers
item.description: While some might be tempted to tweak numbers or invoke grand biblical symbols in tech branding, Steve Jobs forged a different legacy—one that didn’t backdate stock data but instead crafted technology so intuitive it seemed to warp time. Learn why true innovation comes from authenticity and how naming conventions matter.
